original_text: But while all this was going on, I was not in Jerusalem, for in the thirty-second year of Artaxerxes king of Babylon I had returned to the king. Some time later I asked his permission
korean_text: 그 때에는 내가 예루살렘에 있지 아니하였느니라 바벨론 왕 아닥사스다 삼십이년에 내가 왕에게 나아갔다가 며칠 후에 왕에게 말미를 청하고

sentences.original_text: But while all this was going on,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이 모든 일이 일어나는 동안,

sentences.original_text: for in the thirty-second year of Artaxerxes king of Babylon
I had returned to the king.
